p: All reagents used to synthesize nanosystems, and nanostructured coatings were acquired from Sigma-Aldrich (Merck Group, Darmstadt, Germany), if not specified. All chemicals were characterized by analytical purity, according to the American Chemical Society (ACS), and all solutions were prepared using deionized water (MiliQ Â®, Merck Millipore, Burlington, MA, SUA).
